data.eml:eml: Two new species of Metrocoris Mayr (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jehamalar, E. Eyarin, Chandra, Kailash (2013): Two new species of Metrocoris Mayr (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerridae) from India. Zootaxa 3734 (1): 63-71, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3734.1.7
